terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Please read these terms of service carefully before using RocksDev Tools. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using RocksDev Tools, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

points.access: Your access to and use of our services is conditioned upon your acceptance of these terms.
points.binding: These terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who wish to access or use our services.
points.changes: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, and your continued use constitutes acceptance of those changes.

use-of-services.title: Use of Services
use-of-services.description: Our services are provided for developer use and must be used in accordance with these terms.

points.lawful: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.
points.prohibited: You must not use our services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
points.security: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your use of the services.

intellectual-property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual-property.description: All content, features, and functionality of our services are owned by RocksDev Tools and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

points.ownership: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by RocksDev Tools.
points.license: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use our services.
points.restrictions: You may not modify, distribute, or create derivative works based on our services.

user-content.title: User Content
user-content.description: Any data or content you input into our tools remains your property, but you grant us certain rights to provide our services.

points.responsibility: You are solely responsible for any content you input into our services.
points.rights: You retain all rights to your content, but grant us the right to provide our services.
points.removal: We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these terms.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: Our services are provided 'as is' without any warranties, express or implied.

points.as-is: The services are provided without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied.
points.availability: We do not guarantee that our services will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free.
points.accuracy: We make no warranties regarding the accuracy or reliability of any results from the use of our services.

limitation-of-liability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation-of-liability.description: We shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of our services.

points.direct: We shall not be liable for any direct damages resulting from your use of our services.
points.indirect: We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages.
points.exclusions: Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion of certain warranties or limitations of liability.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify or replace these terms at any time.

points.modifications: We may modify these terms at any time without prior notice.
points.notice: We will notify users of any material changes to these terms.
points.continued-use: Your continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

governing-law.title: Governing Law
governing-law.description: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong.

points.jurisdiction: Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Hong Kong.
points.disputes: Any dispute arising from these terms shall be resolved through arbitration.
points.severability: If any provision of these terms is found to be invalid, the remaining provisions shall remain in effect.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our GitHub repository or social media channels.
